message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to invest in this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me.
